thread.title: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener
thread.title_full: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener

title: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener
text:
Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener 8:34 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015 | Filed in: Sports Comments 0 ï»¿ 
Brendan Steele did just enough to keep the lead Saturday at the Frys.com Open, even though he missed a chance to do more. 
As one player after another was piling up birdies on the closing three-hole stretch at Silverado, Steele managed three pars for a 3-under 69 and a one-shot lead over Andrew Loupe and Kevin Na. Brendan Steele hits out of a bunker up to the second green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) 
Loupe had five straight birdies early and four straight birdies late for a 63 and was one shot behind. Na played the closing stretch in 3 under for a 64. 
The PGA Tour season opener is wide open going into the final round. Sixteen players were separated by only four shots. 
Steele was at 14-under 202 as he tries to go wire-to-wire. Rory McIlroy, of Northern Ireland, reacts after missing a birdie putt on the second green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) 
Rory McIlroy never got anything going and was eight shots behind. Emiliano Grillo, of Argentina, putts on the 18th green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Kevin Na hits out of a bunker up to the 18th green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Justin Rose, of Britain, hits out of a bunker up to the second green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Will Wilcox chips the ball onto the sixth green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) Harold Varner III follows his putt on the second green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg)
